This family-run hotel is found along the Ring Road/Route 1, 8.7 mi outside Akureyri. It offers a hot tub, sun terrace and views of Eyjafjördur. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Hotel Natur Akureyri's modern rooms feature bright decor, satellite TV and private bathrooms. Some rooms offer fjord views. Communal facilities include a guest lounge and a kitchen with cooking hobs and a microwave. Lunch and dinner can be arranged if requested in advance. The picturesque Lake Mývatn is less than a 1-hour drive from Natur Hotel. Curious guests can try a game of SwinGolf on site or explore the surrounding hiking trails.
